survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Coffee Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who use subscription-based coffee delivery services to understand their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How long have you been subscribed to this coffee delivery service?

questions.client_notes: Use a radio button format for easy selection on mobile devices.
